languages.text: {n}Пронзенное в нескольких местах тело дергается — умирающий ксенос в доспехе цветов Опустошительной бури поднимает голову и взирает на вас. При виде Маражая он распахивает окровавленный рот.{/n} "Ты..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Пронзенное в нескольких местах тело дергается — умирающий ксенос в доспехе цветов Опустошительной бури поднимает голову и взирает на вас. При виде Маражая он распахивает окровавленный рот.{/n} "Ты..."
traits.speaker: DyingKabalite

languages.text: {n}The convulsing xenos is dressed in Reaving Tempest armour that has been pierced by weapons in several places. The dying warrior raises his head and stares at you. He sees Marazhai and opens his bloody mouth wide.{/n} "You..."
languages.original_text: {n}Пронзенное в нескольких местах тело дергается — умирающий ксенос в доспехе цветов Опустошительной бури поднимает голову и взирает на вас. При виде Маражая он распахивает окровавленный рот.{/n} "Ты..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The body was pierced in several places, but it twitches as the dying xenos in the armour the colours of the Reaving Tempest Desolating raises its head and stares at you. He sees Marazhai and opens his bloody mouth wide.{/n} "You..."
traits.speaker: DyingKabalite

traits.locale_text: {n}The body was pierced in several places, but it twitches as the dying xenos in the armour the colours of the Reaving Tempest Desolating raises its head and stares at you. He sees Marazhai and opens his bloody mouth wide.{/n} "You..."
traits.speaker: DyingKabalite

traits.locale_text: {n}The convulsing xenos is dressed in Reaving Tempest armour that has been pierced by weapons in several places. The dying warrior raises his head and stares at you. He sees Marazhai and opens his bloody mouth wide.{/n} "You..."
traits.speaker: DyingKabalite

languages.text: {n}Der zuckende Xenos trägt eine Rüstung des plündernden Sturms, die an verschiedenen Stellen von Waffen durchbohrt wurde. Der sterbende Krieger hebt den Kopf und starrt dich an. Er sieht Marazhai und öffnet seinen blutigen Mund.{/n} "Ihr ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The convulsing xenos is dressed in Reaving Tempest armour that has been pierced by weapons in several places. The dying warrior raises his head and stares at you. He sees Marazhai and opens his bloody mouth wide.{/n} "You..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der zuckende Xenos trägt eine Rüstung des plündernden Sturms, die an verschiedenen Stellen von Waffen durchbohrt wurde. Der sterbende Krieger hebt den Kopf und starrt dich an. Er sieht Marazhai und öffnet seinen blutigen Mund.{/n} "Ihr ..."
traits.speaker: DyingKabalite

languages.text: {n}穿着狂阴谋团风盔甲的异形抽搐着，身体的好几个部位被武器刺穿了。垂死的战士抬起头，盯着你。当他看到玛拉斋之后，他张大了满是鲜血的嘴巴。{/n}“你……”
languages.original_text: {n}The convulsing xenos is dressed in Reaving Tempest armour that has been pierced by weapons in several places. The dying warrior raises his head and stares at you. He sees Marazhai and opens his bloody mouth wide.{/n} "You..."

traits.locale_text: {n}穿着狂阴谋团风盔甲的异形抽搐着，身体的好几个部位被武器刺穿了。垂死的战士抬起头，盯着你。当他看到玛拉斋之后，他张大了满是鲜血的嘴巴。{/n}“你……”
traits.speaker: DyingKabalite

languages.text: {n}Le xénos convulse dans une armure de la Tempête ravageuse transpercée en plusieurs endroits. Le guerrier à l'agonie lève la tête et vous regarde. Il voit Marazhai et ouvre une bouche ensanglantée.{/n} « Vous... »
languages.original_text: {n}The convulsing xenos is dressed in Reaving Tempest armour that has been pierced by weapons in several places. The dying warrior raises his head and stares at you. He sees Marazhai and opens his bloody mouth wide.{/n} "You..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos convulse dans une armure de la Tempête ravageuse transpercée en plusieurs endroits. Le guerrier à l'agonie lève la tête et vous regarde. Il voit Marazhai et ouvre une bouche ensanglantée.{/n} « Vous...
traits.speaker: DyingKabalite

languages.text: {n}El xenos que convulsiona lleva una armadura de la Tempestad Asoladora que ha sido atravesada por armas en diversos lugares. El guerrero moribundo levanta la cabeza y te mira. Al ver a Marazhai, abre la boca ensangrentada.{/n} «Tú...».
languages.original_text: {n}The convulsing xenos is dressed in Reaving Tempest armour that has been pierced by weapons in several places. The dying warrior raises his head and stares at you. He sees Marazhai and opens his bloody mouth wide.{/n} "You..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos que convulsiona lleva una armadura de la Tempestad Asoladora que ha sido atravesada por armas en diversos lugares. El guerrero moribundo levanta la cabeza y te mira. Al ver a Marazhai, abre la boca ensangrentada.{/n} «Tú...».
traits.speaker: DyingKabalite

languages.text: {n}痙攣で体を震わせる異種族は、突き破られた跡がいくつもある略奪の嵐の鎧をまとっている。死にゆく戦士は頭をもたげじっとこちらを見た。マラズハイに目をとめると、血の滲む口を大きく開ける。{/n}「あなたは…」
languages.original_text: {n}The convulsing xenos is dressed in Reaving Tempest armour that has been pierced by weapons in several places. The dying warrior raises his head and stares at you. He sees Marazhai and opens his bloody mouth wide.{/n} "You..."

traits.locale_text: {n}痙攣で体を震わせる異種族は、突き破られた跡がいくつもある略奪の嵐の鎧をまとっている。死にゆく戦士は頭をもたげじっとこちらを見た。マラズハイに目をとめると、血の滲む口を大きく開ける。{/n}「あなたは…」
traits.speaker: DyingKabalite

languages.text: {n}Müfteris Kasırga zırhları içindeki zeno; birçok yerinden yara almış, yerde kıvranıyor. Ölmekte olan savaşçı, başını kaldırıp gözlerini sana dikiyor. Marazhai'ı görüyor ve kanlar içindeki ağzını açıp konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Siz."
languages.original_text: {n}The convulsing xenos is dressed in Reaving Tempest armour that has been pierced by weapons in several places. The dying warrior raises his head and stares at you. He sees Marazhai and opens his bloody mouth wide.{/n} "You..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Müfteris Kasırga zırhları içindeki zeno, birçok yerinden yara almış ve yerde kıvranıyor. Ölmekte olan savaşçı başını kaldırıyor ve gözlerini sana dikiyor. Marazhai'ı görüyor ve kanlar içindeki ağzını açıp konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Siz."
traits.speaker: DyingKabalite
